title: FUBAR & Fur Rugs
description: Failure is not an optionThat was the creed that Lieutenant Jacob Asher Pierce lived by.It stood for everything he did.As a Navy SEAL. And as a man.Catherine Barker could turn him inside out with a look. She wrecked him and made him feel invincible in the same breath. She was everything he'd ever wanted in a woman.And he intended to make her his.Against all odds. At any cost.They called him Ice, and he risked everything for loveâ€¦Cold As Ice is a complete story with HEA and no cliffhangers, BUT there is a sub-plot that continues through the entire series!Please note: this book contains mature content and graphic violence.
author: Tonya Brooks
